name: Personal PC Setup With Puppet
tagline: Bringing the PC setup out of the dark ages.
body:
Usage
=====
`` sudo wget -O - https://raw.github.com/ograycode/laptop/master/bootstrap.sh | sudo bash ``

About
-----

My configuration for my PC. It bootstraps a fresh install into a fully configured machine in about five minutes. This has only been tested on Elementary OS Luna, but should work on any ubuntu based computer.

Uses puppet master 2.7.11, stdlib 4.1.0 and apt 1.3.0.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
